page.title: 09Farming in Brompton on Swale
page.content:
First we get up at five o'clock and we have a cup of tea.Then we get the cows into the collecting yard.Next we go into the milking parlour,and start the engine.We clean the filters and shut the stallgates.We open the door and eight cows come in each side.We give them some cattle cake to keep them quiet while we put the milking units on.
Every morning and night we milk 100 cows and then we clean out and scrape all the muck out and throw water down the sides and brush down.
The milk tanker comes to collect the milk at 8 o'clock.
We do the same in the evening but store the milk overnight.
